= CORE Wiki =

This is the CORE wiki. It features tips and tricks and other bits of information that haven't made it into the [http://hipserver.mct.phantomworks.org/core/manual/index.html CORE manual] ([http://pf.itd.nrl.navy.mil/core/core_manual.pdf PDF]) yet.

 * [Quickstart]: quickly get up-and-running with CORE
 * [Screenshots]
 * [FAQ]: Frequently Asked Questions
 * [RelatedWork Related Work]: table of emulation tools
 * [API]: CORE Application Programming Interface

Other guides and tips

 * [Linux]: Linux virtualization and CORE
 * [Tips]: a collection of tips
 * [Troubleshooting]
 * [Mac]: Running CORE on Apple Max OS X
 * [Hacking]: coding standards for this project

Citations

Academic publications that use CORE are requested to cite one of the following publications:
 * J. Ahrenholz, Comparison of CORE Network Emulation Platforms, Proceedings of IEEE MILCOM Conference, 2010.
 * J. Ahrenholz, C. Danilov, T. Henderson, and J.H. Kim, CORE: A real-time network emulator, Proceedings of IEEE MILCOM Conference, 2008.
